field.label: Device
field.help: Leave empty to generate a device name. Custom names are possible, but only if the start of the name matches the required prefix and contains numeric characters or dots, e.g. "vlan0.1.2" or "qinq0.3.4".

field.label: Parent
field.help: Only VLAN capable interfaces will be shown.
Enforce protocol selection. 802.1Q is the default for VLAN interfaces, but 802.1ad is used when the parent is a VLAN (QinQ).

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
